name: Fart & Furious
description:
early access build !

Welcome to Fart & Furious, the game where you have to fart the toughest farts from your butt ! 

On this build you could try this new racing experience with a friend, Eat ! and Fart as harder you can to get to the Top (literally)  

One Keyboard and Two butts (players) are required for this version 

Controls:  

ActionPlayer Left (MR Chuck)Player Right (Mr Hams)Eat !"S" Key"Down arrow" KeyFly to the left"A" Key"Left Arrow" KeyFly to the Right"D" Key"Right Arrow" Key

Let's have an epic luncheon ! 

Thank you so much for looking at my new game, please check out all of my animations & games ! 

  • Subscribe to my Youtube Channel for more Cartoons: Youtube.com/Markanime
  • Help me to bring my games for the Switch: markani.me/helpSilla
Play on your web browser
